sections.heading: PROVISIONAL AND INCIDENTAL PROCEEDINGSIN ACTIONS OF NULLITYArt
sections.text: 151. Proceeding for declaration of nullity of a marriage; interim incidental reliefIn a proceeding for declaration of nullity of a marriage, a court may award a party the incidental relief afforded in a proceeding for divorce.Acts 1993,
